Package gg.acai.chatgpt

Class AbstractConversation

java.lang.Object
gg.acai.chatgpt.AbstractConversation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conversation
public class AbstractConversation extends Object implements Conversation
The conversation implementation which handles sending requests to the ChatGPT API.
Since:
09.12.2022 18:04
